question: Which AWS services can be used to store files? Chose 2 answers from the options given below.
Which of the following services uses AWS edge locations?
Which of the following is a benefit of Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) over physical servers?
options: Paying only for what you use
The ability to choose hardware vendors
answers: Paying only for what you use

question: Which AWS provides infrastructure security optimization recommendations?
options: AWS Price List Application Programming Interface (API)
Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) Spot Fleet

question: Which service allows for the collection and tracking of metrics for AWS services?
A Company needs to know which user was responsible for terminating several Amazon Elastic Cloud (Amazon EC2) Instances. Where can the customer find this information?
Which service should an administrator use to register a new domain name with AWS?
What is the value of having AWS Cloud services accessible through an Application Programming Interface (API)?
options: Cloud resources can be managed programmatically
AWS infrastructure use will always be cost-optimized
All application testing is managed by AWS
answers: Cloud resources can be managed programmatically

question: Which of the following examples supports the cloud design principle 'design for failure and nothing will fail'?
options: Adding an elastic load balancer in front of a single Amazon Elastic Computer Cloud (Amazon EC2) instance
Creating and deploying the most cost-effective solution
Deploying an application in multiple Availability Zones
Using Amazon CloudWatch alerts to monitor performance
answers: Deploying an application in multiple Availability Zones

question: Which service allows an administrator to create and modify AWS user permissions?
Which AWS service automates infrastructure provisioning and administrative tasks for an analytical data warehouse?
Which of the following is the responsibility of the AWS customer according to the Shared Security Model?
options: Managing AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM)
answers: Managing AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM)

question: Where can a customer go to get more detail about Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) billing activity that took place 3 months ago?
options: AWS CloudTrail logs stored in Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3)

question: Who has control of the data in an AWS account?
The main benefit of decoupling an application is to:
options: Reduce inter-dependencies so failures do not impact other components.
Enable data synchronization across the web application layer.
Have the ability to execute automated bootstrapping actions.
answers: Reduce inter-dependencies so failures do not impact other components.

question: Which of the following is a benefit of running an application across two Availability Zones?
options: Performance is improved over running in a single Availability Zone.
It is more secure than running in a single Availability Zone.
It significantly reduces the total cost of ownership versus running in a single Availability Zone.
It increases the availability of an application compared to running in a single Availability Zone.
answers: It increases the availability of an application compared to running in a single Availability Zone.

question: Which of the following security requirements are managed by AWS customers? Select 2 answers from the options given below.
Systems applying the cloud architecture principle of elasticity will:
options: Minimize storage requirements by reducing logging and auditing activities.
Create systems that scale to the required capacity based on changes in demand.
Enable AWS to automatically select the most cost-effective services.
Accelerate the design process because recovery from failure is automated, reducing the need for testing.
answers: Create systems that scale to the required capacity based on changes in demand.

question: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) Spot instances are appropriate for which of the following workloads?
options: Workloads that are only run in the morning and stopped at night.
Workloads where the availability of the Amazon EC2 instances can be flexible.
Workloads that need to run for long periods of time without interruption.
Workloads that are critical and need Amazon EC2 instances with termination protection.
answers: Workloads where the availability of the Amazon EC2 instances can be flexible.

question: What AWS feature enables a user to manage services through a web-based user interface?
Which tool can display the distribution of AWS spending?
How can the AWS Management Console be secured against unauthorized access?
Which AWS Cloud service is used to turn on Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)?
A disaster recovery strategy on AWS should be based on launching infrastructure in a separate:
Which of the following is a factor when calculating Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) for the AWS Cloud?
options: The number of servers migrated to AWS
The number of users migrated to AWS
The number of passwords migrated to AWS
The number of keys migrated to AWS
answers: The number of servers migrated to AWS

question: Which AWS service is used to as a global content delivery network (CDN) service in AWS?
Which of the following is a full managed NoSQL database service available with AWS?
A company wants to store data that is not frequently accessed. What is the best and cost efficient solution that should be considered?
You are currently hosting an infrastructure and most of the EC2 instances are near 90-100% utilized. What is the type of EC2 instances you would utilize to ensure costs are minimized?
What is the ability provided by AWS to enable fast, easy, and secure transfers of files over long distances between your client and your Amazon S3 bucket?
As per the AWS Acceptable Use Policy, penetration testing of EC2 instances:
options: May be performed by AWS, and will be performed by AWS upon customer request.
May be performed by AWS, and is periodically performed by AWS.
Are expressly prohibited under all circumstances.
May be performed by the customer on their own instances with prior authorization from AWS.
May be performed by the customer on their own instances, only if performed from EC2 instances.
answers: May be performed by the customer on their own instances with prior authorization from AWS.

question: The Trusted Advisor service provides insight regarding which four categories of an AWS account?
options: Security, fault tolerance, high availiability, and connectivity.
Security, access control, high availiability, and performance.
Performance, cost optimization, security, and fault tolerance.
Performance, cost optimization, access control, and connectivity.
answers: Performance, cost optimization, security, and fault tolerance.

question: A company is deploying a two-tier, high available web application to AWS. Which service provides durable static content while utilizing lower Overall CPU resources for the web tier?
What best describes the "Principal of Least Privilege"?
options: All users should have the same baseline permissions granted to them to use basic AWS services.
Users should be granted permission to access only resources they need to do their assigned job.
Users should submit all access request in written so that there is a paper trail of who needs access to different AWS resources.
Users should always have a little more access granted to them then they need, just in case they end up needed it in the future.
answers: Users should be granted permission to access only resources they need to do their assigned job.

question: Which of the below mentioned services can be used to host virtual servers in the AWS cloud?
Which of the following can be used to protect EC2 Instances hosted in AWS?
options: Usage of Network Access Control Lists
answers: Usage of Network Access Control Lists

question: You work for a company that is planning on using the AWS EC2 service. They currently create golden images of their deployed Operating system. Which of the following correspond to a gold image in AWS?

An application uses a PostgreSQL database running on a single Amazon EC2 instance. A Cloud Practitioner has been asked to increase the availability of the database so there is automatic recovery in the case of a failure. Which tasks can the Cloud Practitioner take to meet this requirement?
options: Migrate the database to Amazon RDS and enable the Multi-AZ feature
Configure an Elastic Load Balancer in front of the EC2 instance
Configure EC2 Auto Recovery to move the instance to another Region
Set the DeleteOnTermination value to false for the EBS root volume
answers: Migrate the database to Amazon RDS and enable the Multi-AZ feature

question: Which of the following deployments involves the reliability pillar of the AWS Well-Architected Framework?
options: Attach a WebACL to a CloudFront distribution

question: A user needs to identify underutilized Amazon EC2 instances to reduce costs. Which AWS service or feature will meet this requirement?
Which AWS service or feature can assist with protecting a website that is hosted outside of AWS?
Which benefits can a company gain by deploying a relational database on Amazon RDS instead of Amazon EC2? (Select TWO.)
Which AWS service can a team use to deploy infrastructure on AWS using familiar programming languages?

A Cloud Practitioner anticipates an increase in application traffic at a future date and time when a sales event will take place. How can the Cloud Practitioner configure Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling to ensure the right number of Amazon EC2 instances are available ahead of the event?
options: Configure a target tracking scaling policy.

question: A company is launching a new website which is expected to have highly variable levels of traffic. The website will run on Amazon EC2 and must be highly available. What is the MOST cost-effective approach?
options: Determine the highest expected traffic and use an appropriate instance type.
Launch the website using an Amazon EC2 instance running on a dedicated host.
Create an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group and configure an Elastic Load Balancer.
Use the AWS CLI to launch and terminate Amazon EC2 instances to match demand.
answers: Create an Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling group and configure an Elastic Load Balancer.

question: A Cloud Practitioner needs to monitor a new Amazon EC2 instance's CPU and network utilization. Which AWS service should be used?
